blogPost.excerpt: Say goodbye to alt-tabbing for scattered resources and "productivity" tools TODAY. Typed⏎ is your one-and-only document workspace that streamlines research, drafting, communication and knowledge management. If Google Drives you crazy, get Typed⏎ now.
blogPost.body: Say goodbye to alt-tabbing for scattered resources and "productivity" tools TODAY. Typed⏎ is your one-and-only document workspace that streamlines research, drafting, communication and knowledge management. If Google Drives you crazy, get Typed⏎ now.
blogPost.title: Typed⏎ Beta - Google Docs on Steroids
blogPost.author: Trevor Owens

localize.description: 告别alt-tabbing分散的资源和 "生产力 "工具，今天。Typed⏎是您唯一的文档工作区，可简化研究、起草、沟通和知识管理。如果谷歌让你抓狂，现在就去买Typed⏎。
告別alt-tabbing分散的資源和 "生產力 "工具，今天。Typed⏎是您唯一的文檔工作區，可簡化研究、起草、溝通和知識管理。如果谷歌讓你抓狂，現在就去買Typed⏎。

previous.excerpt: Global.health is a collaborative effort by technologists and researchers from leading international institutions to build a trusted, detailed, and accurate resource of real-time infectious disease data.
previous.title: Global.health - Access data about 5M+ anonymized COVID-19 cases

localize.description: Global.health是来自主要国际机构的技术专家和研究人员的合作努力，旨在建立一个值得信赖、详细、准确的实时传染病数据资源。
localize.tagline: 获取500万+匿名的COVID-19案例的数据

localize.description: Global.health是來自主要國際機構的技術專家和研究人員的合作努力，旨在建立一個值得信賴、詳細、準確的實時傳染病數據資源。
localize.tagline: 獲取500萬+匿名的COVID-19案例的數據
